title: Task Management API
description: Task Management API is a RESTful API designed for task management, featuring CRUD operations, JWT-based authentication, and PostgreSQL database integration. This project is built with Spring Boot and demonstrates modern practices for building APIs.

title: Spring JWT Authentication Template
description: This project is a template for implementing minimal authentication in Spring using JWT tokens. It provides a ready-to-use structure for managing user authentication and authorization with customizable security configurations.

title: E-commerce Backend API
description: E-commerce Backend API is a RESTful API designed for managing products, cart, and orders, including integration with Stripe API for payment processing. This project is built with Spring Boot and follows modern practices for API development.
